body_html:
It would be great if this worked with Variable tensors and indices too.

My make-shift code for doing this right now is

def embedding_lookup(embeddings, indices):
     return embeddings.index_select(0, indices.view(-1)).view(*(indices.size() + embeddings.size()[1:]))

Hopefully this is helpful!
body:
It would be great if this worked with `Variable` tensors and indices too.

My make-shift code for doing this right now is
```
def embedding_lookup(embeddings, indices):
     return embeddings.index_select(0, indices.view(-1)).view(*(indices.size() + embeddings.size()[1:]))
```
Hopefully this is helpful!
